content: placement look at the fi rst line of chart 7 loop method knit the stitches from the palm and rejoin the yarn and work chart 7 corresponding pick up two stitches from the cast on edge to the to your size until the fi nger is 3mm shorter than ring fi nger continue working these 20 21 22 sts your thumb when wearing the glove continue as as described for the ring fi nger described for the ring fi nger index fi nger put the remaining 20 21 22 stitches back on the needle knit them/work the estabilshed cable pat- weave in all ends if there are any holes from tern see chart 2 red box then pick up 2 stitches where the stitches are picked up close them by from the cast on edge of the middle fi nger conti- weaving in while wearing the glove nue working these 22 23 24 sts as described for the ring fi nger pinky put the 15 16 17 stitches which have been on hold back on the needle distributing them on needle 1 and 2 work the stitches on needle 1 pick up 2 stitches from the cast on edge to the ring fi nger then work the remaining stitches on needle 2 maintaining the established cable pattern see chart 2 red box continue working these 17 18 19 sts as described for the ring fi nger lg ring fi nger put 9 9 9 stitches from the palm back on needle 1 and 8 9 10 stitches from the back of the hand back on needle 2 knit the stitches from the palm cast on 2 stitches using the backward loop method and complete the round by knitting the stitches from the back of the hand continue working these 19 20 21 sts as described for the ringfi nger middle fi nger put 8 9 10 stitches from the palm back on needle 1 and 8 8 8 stitches from the back of the hand back on needle 2 knit the stitches from the palm cast on 2 stitches using the backward loop method knit the stitches from the back of the hand and pick up two stitches from the cast on edge to the ring fi nger continue working these 20 21 22 sts as described for the rg ring fi nger index fi nger same as on the right hand pinky same as for the right hand © julia mueller - page 3 - symbols description description knit make one by lifting strand in between stitch just worked and the next stitch knit into knit through the back loop back of this thread make one by lifting strand in between stitch purl just worked and the next stitch purl into no stitch back of this thread slip one to cable needle hold in front k1 pick up stitches from the cast on edge tbl k1 tbl from cable needle slip one to cable needle hold in back k1
